function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close customer relationships may increase the risk of disease transmission in service SMEs.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease spread within the customer base and staff.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and social distancing measures within the service SMEs.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, online booking systems, and remote customer service tools.","People":"Service SMEs employees, customers, and the general public.","Owner":"Service SMEs management and government health agencies."}]}
